TextLibrary.Text: I would ask a favor of you.
I would ask a favor of you.
Name it. Your people have suffered greatly at the hands of the MRI. Any aid we can offer is simply our duty.
Name it. Your people have suffered greatly at the hands of the MRI. Any aid we can offer is simply our duty.
We have no ships. Help us leave this place and travel to the outer rim where the MRI cannot find us. We need to split into 5 groups.
We have no ships. Help us leave this place and travel to the outer rim where the MRI cannot find us. We need to split into 5 groups.
We cannot take you all at once; our ship is large, but the life support systems will not handle all of your people. So gather the first group together. Where do you wish to go?
We cannot take you all at once; our ship is large, but the life support systems will not handle all of your people. So gather the first group together. Where do you wish to go?
